TopicTitle: Video Wednesdays: Ride of the Jack O Lanterns

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_ne8d2lCaDd1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/6VWRLUnyNl4" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p><strong>Noah Sans Ark</strong> had a bit of fun with Porkjet’s new jack o’ lanterns in this video. Does it feature pumpkin-inspired chaos? Yes! Are there explosions? Yes! Does the sound track make the scene that much more glorious? Yes! Besides, who doesn’t like flying pumpkins?</p>
